Description: Pottery ostracon containing the end of a letter written in Coptic.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.22, pl.16)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82570) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82570)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 16:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
